description: Information specific to plate-based sequencing experiments.
title: Plate-based sequencing
name: plate_based_sequencing

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

plate_label.description: A label or name for the plate on which the well is located.
plate_label.guidelines: Plate label should be unique in the project.

well_label.description: A label or name for the well in which the cell is located.
well_label.guidelines: Well label should be unique for the plate.

well_quality.description: Quality of well if imaged before sequencing.
well_quality.example: Should be one of: 'OK', 'control, 2-cell well', 'control, empty well', or 'low quality cell'.
